params.Leafs Spring: Fuwa brand with 8pcs of leafs spring
params.Manhole: Aluminum alloy Φ500mm (20") manhole with aluminum alloy cover
params.Discharge Valve: Aluminum alloy discharge valve with cover
params.Foot Valve: Pneumatic control DN80 aluminum alloy foot valves
params.Pneumatic Control System: 1 set pneumatic control combined switch / 1 unit emergency switch
params.Discharge Hose: 2 units 3"×6m factory PVC hose with quick coupling on both ends
params.Fire Extinguisher Carrier: 2 units at the left of rear of tanker
params.Electric System: One unit of 24V 7-pin ISO standard socket

types.introText: The aluminium fuel tanker trailers produced by our company mainly include the following types:

items.name: 45000 Liters Aluminium Fuel Tanker Trailer
items.description: The tank body adopts a double-layer structure or is added with high-efficiency thermal insulation materials, which can effectively maintain the temperature stability of the liquid in the tank. It is suitable for transporting liquids with strict temperature requirements, such as certain chemical raw materials and edible oils, avoiding the impact on the quality of the liquid due to temperature changes.

items.name: 55000 Litres Aluminium Fuel Tanker Trailers
items.description: The 55,000-liter capacity of the trailer provides significant transportation efficiency. It can carry a large volume of liquid in a single trip, reducing the number of trips required for transporting a given amount of material. This is particularly beneficial for long-distance transportation or when dealing with high-volume shipments, as it helps save time and transportation costs.

params.Paint: Sand blasting, epoxy primer, finish paint

types.introText: The carbon steel fuel tank trailers produced by our company mainly include the following types:

items.name: 45000 Liters Carbon Steel Fuel Tanker Trailer
items.description: The tank body adopts a double-layer structure or is added with high-efficiency thermal insulation materials, which can effectively maintain the temperature stability of the liquid in the tank. It is suitable for transporting liquids with strict temperature requirements.

types.introText: The bulk cement trailers produced by our company mainly include the following types:

items.name: 45m³ Bulk Cement Trailer
items.description: Designed for efficient transportation of bulk cement and powder materials with high-capacity storage and pneumatic discharge system.

It is suitable for transporting liquids with strict temperature requirements, such as certain chemical raw materials and edible oils, avoiding the impact on the quality of the liquid due to temperature changes.

It can carry a large volume of liquid in a single trip, reducing the number of trips required for transporting a given amount of material. This is particularly beneficial for long-distance transportation or when dealing with high-volume shipments, as it helps save time and transportation costs.
